pkgmetadata.longdescription: Word and Document Vector Models // Create dense vector representation of words and documents using 'quanteda'. Currently implements Word2vec (Mikolov et al., 2013) doi:10.48550/arXiv.1310.4546 and Latent Semantic Analysis (Deerwester et al., 1990) doi:10.1002/(SICI)1097-4571(199009)41:6%3C391::AID- ASI1%3E3.0.CO;2-9.
